WEDDING EVENTS

An Indianapolis wedding caterer you can count on

YOUR WEDDING IS YOUR OYSTER

What do your dream wedding events entail? Indy Fresh Catering provides affordable customized catering packages so that you can choose what works best for your affair. From engagement and bridal showers to the rehearsal dinner and, of course, your big day, there are so many fun wedding events ahead of you. This local Indianapolis wedding caterer wants you to enjoy them and to take any stress out of the equation. That’s why we offer a combination of delicious, quality cuisine that is made from scratch for your party and topnotch customer service that guides you from planning to always-on-time and organized day-of service. Congrats!



FRESH MENU OPTIONS

We’ve been at this whole wedding catering business for a while and know how important it is to offer a variety of menus. You might want heavy hors d’oeuvres for the engagement shower and breakfast items for a send-off brunch while a beautiful Italian dinner is what you had in mind for your wedding dinner. Plus, we are able to accommodate a variety of dietary intolerances. Indy Fresh Catering has got you covered! Check out our comprehensive range…

VIEW MENU


THE WHOLE PACKAGE

We’ll bring everything you need. Our all-inclusive package includes serving utensils, flatware, plates, paper products, linens for buffet tables, ice and cups. Prefer to scale up your place settings from paper and plastic to china and linens? We can certainly do that as well.

FIND OUT MORE


AT YOUR SERVICE

We aim to please—Indy Fresh Catering’s wedding service gives you several options to choose from:

  • Snack Platters
  • Passed Trays
  • Buffet
  • Personalized Bars
  • Station Service
REQUEST A QUOTE


BUDGET FRIENDLY TO BOOT

Because we believe your budget shouldn’t prevent you from having the wedding of your dreams, our wedding packages start at $16 per person. Give us a ring to get started.

CONTACT US

Testimonials

“If you’re looking for a caterer for an event look no further than Indy Fresh! We were amazed by the service we were provided! The entire staff we worked with was polite, professional, upbeat and I wouldn’t doubt my decision to use them for one second. Not to mention the food was delicious, we constantly received compliments on the food and how much people loved it. If I ever need a caterer in the future, I know who i’ll be using. Thank you Indy Fresh!”

— Brittney Dillingham, Bride 5/16/15
